{docbook}
<highlights>
<itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.RESTServices">REST Services</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Introduction to Rest Services, and details (including HTTP Methods, formats, data format, REST configuration) of Restful Web Service, and how to create a REST service.</para>
      </listitem>
       <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.UIExtensions">UI Extensions</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Instructions on how to do UI extensions via adding your own UIAction/ActionListener, registering your UIAction and running your own UI extension sample.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.AuthoringExtension">Authoring Extension</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Information about the extended publication plugin and publication manager.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CONTref.Extensions.AuxiliaryAttributes">Auxiliary attributes for documents</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Details of how to create the <emphasis>DocumentContext</emphasis> which stores some auxiliary attributes of the document and helps document listeners make decision
based on these attributes.</para>
      </listitem>
</itemizedlist>
</highlights>
